Belthassan: Yes. I guess our commander is eager to see you. Come with 
me. He is in the control room.

He starts walking. He turns his head to the rookie and says:

Belthassan: Curious one, is she not?

------------------------

Gesper seemed astonished by the news.

Gesper: Ah... well... I... wanted to know if you had had any news from 
the Tripredacus, but I guess you just gave me those news... I'm sorry 
about what happened. Even if Firedrill cannot be brought back though, 
you can be assured that we will stand aside the Autobots.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Anachronox / Pacifix / Crossroads --
> 
> Anachronox bows, mostly because he isn't sure what he should 
> do. "Greetings, I am Anachronox as you have just been told. You must 
> be Melchana, and you are then Tankor." He walks forward, and circles 
> the two, assessing them as a potential threat. He grunts, and nods 
to 
> both of them, then he joins Belthassan and stands between Belthassan 
> and the other two, his arms crossed. "I'd like to meet Daemos now." 
> says Anachronox calmly.
> 
> ---------------------------
> 
> Pacifix exits the control room and runs right into Crossroads and 
> Gesper. "Ahh! Crossroads, just who I was heading out to look for." 
He 
> nods to Gesper as well, then turns back to Crossroads. "I'm going to 
> be away for a bit, there seem to have been an accident at the Shadow 
> Destiny and Firedrill was involved. He... isn't quite Firedrill 
> anymore, he's now Anachronox and he has joined the Tripreds."
> 
> Crossroads listens with intent, and his eyes widden as he hears the 
> story. "Are you heading over there now?
> 
> "Yes," replies Pacifix, "I need to see whether I can bring back 
> Anachronox as Firedrill. Otherwise, we'll probably have to just take 
> the loss, and endur..."
> 
> "..." Crossroads is silent, "We'll watch the ship while you're gone. 
> Is there anything that needs to be done?"
> 
> Pacifix thinks for a sec, "Hmm, not really. Just monitor the 
> defences, in case of an attack."
> 
> Crossroads nods, "Oh, by the way, Gesper wanted to see you, and here 
> he is." He turns to Gesper expectantly.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Melchana and Tankor were still unloading the Hellgate and storing 
> the 
> > energon fruits in the Shadow Destiny. Hearing their names, they 
> both 
> > turn around with a puzzled look.
> > 
> > Tankor: Belthassan, who's that guy? Newbie?
> > 
> > Belthassan: In some ways, yes, Tankor, he is. In fact, you have 
met 
> > him earlier.
> > 
> > Melchana: Odd one... I'll have to challenge him one day...
> > 
> > Belthassan: Stop that, sister. Our new friend is called 
Anachronox. 
> I 
> > will present him to Daemos now.
> > 
> > ----------------------------------
> > 
> > Daemos: I look forward to our meeting.
> > 
> > ----------------------------------
> > 
> > Gesper hears Pacifix.
> > 
> > Gesper: Ah! He is that way! Come on, Crossroad!
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > -- Anachronox / Pacifix / Crossroads --
> > > 
> > > Anachronox nods and follows Belthassan. He enters the storage 
> room 
> > > and looks for two bots.
> > > 
> > > ----------------------
> > > 
> > > "Alright," confirms Pacifix, "I'll see you in a little while. 
> > Pacifix 
> > > out." Pacifix pauses a moment to reflect, then stands. He looks 
> into 
> > > the monitors, and frowns, <Where's Crossroads, he should be done 
> > > showing Gesper around by now. I'll have to find him.> Pacifix 
> turns 
> > > and walks towards the exit of the control room.
> > > 
> > > ----------------------
> > > 
> > > Crossroads nods, "I think so, he was anxious to find out how 
> > > Firedrill was doing. He's probably contacted the Shadow Destiny 
> by 
> > > now." As the continue down the corridor, he shrugs, "I wonder 
how 
> > > Firedrill's doing. I'll ask Pacifix when we find him."
